name.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

modelServicePort.description: The exposed port of the model server, if left blank a value will be defaulted to 8001.

appPort.description: The exposed port of the chatbot application server, if left blank a value will be defaulted to 8501.

initContainer.description: The image used for the initContainer of the chatbot app deployment, if left blank a value will be defaulted to 'quay.io/redhat-ai-dev/granite-7b-lab:latest'.

appContainer.description: The image used for the chatbot application interface, if left blank a value will be defaulted to 'quay.io/redhat-ai-dev/chatbot:latest'.

modelInitCommand.description: The command of the model server initContainer, if left blank a value will be defaulted to ['/usr/bin/install', '/model/model.file', '/shared/'].

modelPath.description: The path of the model file inside the model server container, if left blank a value will be defaulted to '/model/model.file'.

modelServerContainer.description: The image used for the model server, if left blank a value will be defaulted to 'quay.io/ai-lab/llamacpp_python:latest'.
